text: Ross Philip Dallow (4 December 1937 â€“ 20 July 2020) was a senior member of the New Zealand Police. He was a very important person in improved race relations in Auckland. He was also an Auckland local politician serving as a member of the Auckland Council from 2010 to 2016. Dallow died on 20 July 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians Category:Police officers
title: Ross Dallow
